name: The Flames (itch)
description:
A difficult 10 level puzzle game created in puzzlescript

which involves the following and more:

Pushing barrels into wood to spread fire

pushing wood into wood to spread fire

pushing barrels away from wood so it doesn't catch on fire

source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=ea24893d81f84b4f11981e73f2ecf830
